title: Stop the red steer
brief_description: Shows the devastation of areas near Hobart in the February 1967 bushfires and the efforts of regular and volunteer firefighters to control them. Demonstrates methods generally recommended for preventing and dealing with bushfires.
description: Shows the devastation of areas near Hobart in the February 1967 bushfires and the efforts of regular and volunteer firefighters to control them. Demonstrates methods generally recommended for preventing and dealing with bushfires.
